overview:
David Wilson is an entrepreneur and business leader/strategist with 20+ years of experience in various technology markets.

David currently serves as President & CEO of Spawn Labs, which gives gamers the freedom to play their console video games, either alone or with friends, at home or on the road from any network-connected computer.

Prior to Spawn Labs, David served as:

VP Marketing for Metreos, a VoIP application environment company which was acquired by Cisco in 2006.

VP Products and Business Development for VIEO, an enterprise management company recognized with InfoWorldâ€™s â€œBest Systems Management Product for 2004â€ award.

VP of Marketing and Business Development for United Devices, a desktop grid/cloud computing company that commercialized the SETI@home technology and merged into UnivaUD.

VP Marketing and later President & COO of Deja.com, a Usenet search engine and comparative shopping engine company sold to Google and eBay.

Director of Brand Management for Micrografx, in charge of the consumer products division with titles like Hallmark Card Studio and Crayola Art Studio.

David holds an MBA from Stanford University and a BBA summa cum laude from Baylor University.
